title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 520.14 - Application for waiver of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 520.14 - Application for waiver of rules

State Regulations

The Court of Appeals, upon application, may
in its discretion vary the application of or waive any provision of these rules
where strict compliance will cause undue hardship to the applicant. Such
application shall be in the form of a verified petition setting forth the
applicant's name, age and residence address, the facts relied upon and a prayer
for relief. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
520.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
